::DarkMouse::

She looked at the two bots.
"It's been real nice to meet you both. And thank you for letting me 
know where I was headed.  I think I'll take another direction then. 
Good bye!" She turned and bolted away into the trees.

She ran as fast as she could through the forest.  Her mind 
racing. "One bot is a coincidence. Two bots is one bot too many."  
She ran , weaved, ducked and went through the forest as fast as she 
could run.  She stopped a moment, put the rat down, transformed into 
mouse mode.  She picked up the rat by the scruff of the neck with her 
mouth.  She scurried along the forest floor staying under bush and 
foliage cover.  Her intsincts told her to run and get away.  Her bot 
side told her to fight.  But with no other bot with her, running was 
her best option.
